  ⎿  Bash(python3 << 'EOF'                                  timeout: 
         import subprocess                                  30s
         import json
         from datetime import datetime, timedelta

         # Get all incomplete tasks from OmniFocus
         script = '''
         tell application "OmniFocus"
             tell default document
                 set allTasks to flattened tasks whose
         completed is false
                 set taskList to {}
                 repeat with t in allTasks
                     set taskInfo to {name:(name of t),
         note:(note of t), dueDate:missing value,
         flagged:(flagged of t), project:missing value,
         tags:{}, estimatedMinutes:missing value}

                     -- Due date
                     if due date of t is not missing value
         then
                         set end of taskInfo to
         {dueDate:(due date of t as string)}
                     end if

                     -- Project name
                     if containing project of t is not
         missing value then
                         set projectName to name of
         containing project of t
                         set end of taskInfo to
         {project:projectName}
                     end if

                     -- Tags
                     set taskTags to tags of t
                     set tagNames to {}
                     repeat with tg in taskTags
                         set end of tagNames to (name of tg)
                     end repeat

                     -- Estimated time
                     if estimated minutes of t is not
         missing value then
                         set end of taskInfo to
         {estimatedMinutes:(estimated minutes of t)}
                     end if

                     set end of taskList to {taskName:(name
         of t), taskDue:dueDate of taskInfo,
         taskProject:project of taskInfo,
         taskFlagged:(flagged of t), taskTags:tagNames,
         taskEstimate:estimatedMinutes of taskInfo,
         taskNote:(note of t)}
                 end repeat
                 return taskList
             end tell
         end tell
         '''

         result = subprocess.run(['osascript', '-e',
         script], capture_output=True, text=True)
         print(result.stdout)
         if result.stderr:
             print(f"Error: {result.stderr}",
         file=__import__('sys').stderr)
         EOF
         )
